elements.name: question1
elements.title: What fundamental distinction can be made in terms of conversational behavior?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What kind of conversational behavior is indicated by characteristics such as appreciation, I-messages and open W-questions?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What is meant by "killer phrase"? Explain the term with an example.
elements.correctAnswer: It's always been like that. / There's nothing you can do. / That doesn't make any sense.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: In which phases do structured discussions take place?
elements.correctAnswer: Welcome, small talk, discussion, open questions, outlook, farewell

elements.name: question5
elements.title: How should written invitations be structured?
elements.correctAnswer: So that the structure of the conversation is clear.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: What is the advantage of visualizing the process on a poster?
elements.correctAnswer: The process is visible to everyone and thus supports orientation.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What work can be involved in following up an interview? Name two.
